title: Algorithm assess in terms of data sovereignty
description: This data model represents the assessment of an AI algorithm, initially offered as a service

globalQualification.description: Property. Global qualification of the algorithm

socialImpact.description: Property. if the algorithm has any kind of social impact assessment

checkBias.description: Property. If the algorthm has been check against these potential bias. race, ethnicity, gender, nationality, income, sexual orientation, ability and political or religious belief.

race.description: Property. If the algorithm has been assessed in terms of race bias

ethnicity.description: Property. If the algorithm has been assessed in terms of ethnicity bias

gender.description: Property. If the algorithm has been assessed in terms of gender bias

nationality.description: Property. If the algorithm has been assessed in terms of nationality bias

income.description: Property. If the algorithm has been assessed in terms of income bias

sexualOrientation.description: Property. If the algorithm has been assessed in terms of sexual orientation bias

politicalBelief.description: Property. If the algorithm has been assessed in terms of political beliefs bias

religiousBelief.description: Property. If the algorithm has been assessed in terms of religious beliefs bias

iso27017.description: Property. If the service is compliant with ISO 27017 standard

iso27701.description: Property. If the service is compliant with ISO 27701 standard

iso27018.description: Property. If the service is compliant with ISO 27018 standard
